secondaryText.en: Explore the best deals and exclusive offers.
secondaryText.fr: Découvrez les meilleures offres et offres exclusives.

introSecondaryText.en: Get your orders delivered swiftly to your doorstep.
introSecondaryText.fr: Recevez vos commandes rapidement chez vous.
introSecondaryText.ar: احصل على طلباتك بسرعة إلى باب منزلك.

introSecondaryText.en: Hassle-free returns if you’re not satisfied.
introSecondaryText.fr: Retours sans tracas si vous n'êtes pas satisfait.
introSecondaryText.ar: إرجاع بدون عناء إذا لم تكن راضيًا.

introSecondaryText.en: Your transactions are safe with us.
introSecondaryText.fr: Vos transactions sont en sécurité avec nous.

recentProducts.name: Gruh Udyog
recentProducts.short_description: we offers a wide range of delectable and traditional Indian snacks, including crispy khakhra, flavorful namkeen, roasted and fried dry fruits, fresh bakery products, aromatic mukhvas, tangy achar, and more. Discover authentic tastes and high-quality products crafted with care.

recentProducts.name: Gourmet
recentProducts.short_description: we delivers a diverse selection of premium culinary products, including crispy chips, savory dips, flavorful sauces, gourmet food ingredients, high-quality dry fruits, healthy food options, convenient frozen food, and fresh dairy products. Elevate your dining experience with our carefully curated and top-notch offerings.

recentProducts.name: Chocolates
recentProducts.short_description: we offers a delightful assortment of sweet treats, including rich chocolate bars, indulgent chocolate balls, colorful candies, fun lollipops, and more. Satisfy your sweet tooth with our premium and varied chocolate selections.

recentProducts.name: Beverages
recentProducts.short_description: Beverages features a diverse range of refreshing drinks, from natural juices and fizzy soft drinks to energizing energy drinks, nutritious protein shakes, and vegan-friendly options. Discover the perfect drink to suit every taste and occasion.

recentProducts.name: Ice creams
recentProducts.short_description: Ice Cream offers a delectable selection of creamy frozen treats, including classic flavors, gourmet blends, and indulgent sundaes. Enjoy a scoop of your favorite ice cream for a delightful and refreshing dessert experience.

aboutSectionText.1: Nasta Bazar, Ahmedabad's first-of-its-kind snacking store, created for those who relish tasty bites at any time of the day. We offer a diverse range of traditional Indian snacks such as Khakhra, Ganthiya, Sev, Chavana, Bhakharvadi, Wafers, Roasted snacks, and Mukhvas, alongside gourmet delights like Chips, Dips, Sauces, and premium Dry Fruits. But that’s just the beginning.
aboutSectionText.2: At Nasta Bazar, we go beyond the ordinary, bringing you an assortment of Dairy products like Butter, Cheese, and Paneer, as well as a variety of Healthy and Diet foods for the health-conscious. Our Bakery section is stocked with freshly baked cookies, biscuits, Khari, and toast, perfect for any time snacking. And for those with a sweet tooth, our collection of Chocolates and Ice creams won’t disappoint.
aboutSectionText.3: To complete your snacking experience, we also offer a curated selection of Indian and international Beverages. Whether you’re a kid, an adult, or a veteran snack lover, Nasta Bazar has something to satisfy every craving. Visit us today and explore a world of flavors where quality meets variety, making snacking a delightful experience any time of the day or night.
